title: turning off chat all together
body:
hi, i want to know if there is a way to turn off the in-game chat indefinitely. i have no desire to talk to anyone in this game at this time due to the constant abuse and feeding as a result of said abuse, i had a game today where a lee sin was being counter jungled and was generally having a hard time playing his position.
i let the lee sin take some cs from my lane (mid) to help keep him relevant in the game, after he was told to "go hang himself" by or top lane player several times he decided he would feed for the rest of the game and not try to win at all.

as a result of this kind of abuse im left with 2 options that im aware of, to remove myself from the chat system all together or to just stop playing the game.
ofc i like the game and do not want to be forced to leave the game but if something is not being done about the issue then i have no other choice.

the LoL "Code of Conduct" clearly states this kind of behaviour is not permitted but there appears to be no punishment for there actions.

TL;DR: how do i turn off the in-game chat indefinitely ?

replies.body:
Hey valistus,

As far as I'm aware, unfortunately there's no effective way to indefinitely disable chat. If a player is being negative towards you, I strongly encourage you to mute that player and report them in the post-game lobby. Negative behavior isn't acceptable in the community, and you'll be contributing by showing that player that their behavior isn't in line with the community's views and values.
i was able to accomplish my goal with some clever overlays for my my music players etc :)
